TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CallerFilePathAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class CallerFilePathAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class CallerFilePathAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 可讓您取得包含呼叫端之原始程式檔的完整路徑。

span.span: Allows you to obtain the full path of the source file that contains the caller.

summary.span: 這是在編譯時的檔案路徑。

span.span: This is the file path at the time of compile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您套用`CallerFilePath`屬性加入具有預設值的選擇性參數。You apply the `CallerFilePath` attribute to an optional parameter that has a default value. 您必須指定明確的預設值的選擇性參數。You must specify an explicit default value for the optional parameter. 您無法將此屬性套用至未指定為選擇性的參數。You can't apply this attribute to parameters that aren't specified as optional. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[呼叫端資訊](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9cb2b8c0-c4f6-44b8-9c90-38948455b373)。For more information, see [Caller Information](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9cb2b8c0-c4f6-44b8-9c90-38948455b373). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 `CallerFilePath` 屬性。The following example shows how to use the `CallerFilePath` attribute. 每次呼叫`TraceMessage`方法時，呼叫端資訊會替代做為選擇性參數的引數。On each call to the `TraceMessage` method, the caller information is substituted as an argument to the optional parameter. [!code-csharp[csProgGuideAttributes#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/csProgGuideAttributes/CS/callerinfo.cs#51)] [!code-vb[csProgGuideAttributes#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/csProgGuideAttributes/vb/callerinfo.vb#51)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
